dataset:
select version()
show variables
show full processlist
show /*!50002 global*/ status
show table status from `%1$s`
show character set
create database `%1$s` default character set '%2$s' default collate '%3$s'
drop database `%1$s`
show databases
show collation where charset='%1$s'
show character set
show engines
show tables from `%1$s`
alter table `%1$s`.`%2$s`

show full columns from `%1$s`.`%2$s`
show keys from `%1$s`.`%2$s`
alter table `%1$s`.`%2$s`
select * from mysql.user order by user, host
select count(*) from `%1$s`.`%2$s`
select * from `%1$s`.`%2$s` limit %3$d
show columns from `mysql`.`user` where field like '%_priv'
flush privileges
<query key="getUserProperties>select * from `mysql`.`user` where user='%1$s' and host='%2$s'
repair table `%1$s`.`%2$s`
check table `%1$s`.`%2$s`
optimize table `%1$s`.`%2$s`
analyze table `%1$s`.`%2$s`
